$listeners.desc: All native events are being propagated (you don't need the '.native' modifier)

name.desc: Name of the icon, following Quasar convention

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name

left.desc: Useful if icon is on the left side of something: applies a standard margin on the right side of Icon

right.desc: Useful if icon is on the right side of something: applies a standard margin on the left side of Icon
